ThingDef.description:
Terminal for cemetery vault management and access point to it. Size S.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside. Allow colonists to visit stored sarcophagus.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Allows construction of sarcophagus on platform. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

Terminal for cemetery vault management and access point to it. Size M.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside. Allow colonists to visit stored sarcophagus.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Allows construction of sarcophagus on platform. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

Terminal for cemetery vault management and access point to it. Size L.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside. Allow colonists to visit stored sarcophagus.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Allows construction of sarcophagus on platform. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

ThingDef.label: medieval cemetery vault panel
ThingDef.description:
Terminal for cemetery vault management and access point to it. Medieval type.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can be lowered manually to store items inside.

Terminal operated manually. Allows construction of sarcophagus on platform. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

Terminal for cryptosleep vault management and access point to it. Size S.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Allows construction of cryptosleep casket on platform. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

Terminal for cryptosleep vault management and access point to it. Size M.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Allows construction of cryptosleep casket on platform. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

Terminal for cryptosleep vault management and access point to it. Size L.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Allows construction of cryptosleep casket on platform. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

Terminal for storage vault management and access point to it. Size S.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

Terminal for storage vault management and access point to it. Size M.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

Terminal for storage vault management and access point to it. Size L.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

Terminal for storage vault management and access point to it. Size XL.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can move through vault shaft and interact with storage space inside.

Terminal operated manually and requires power to work. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

ThingDef.label: medieval storage vault panel
ThingDef.description:
Terminal for storage vault management and access point to it. Medieval type.

Vault is located directly below it. Mobile platform can be lowered manually to store items inside.

Terminal operated manually. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

ThingDef.label: ultra storage vault panel
ThingDef.description:
Terminal for storage vault management and access point to it. Ultra type.

Vault is located directly below it. AI core controls process of things teleportation between surface and vault.

Terminal operated by AI and requires power to work. Sub terminals can be constructed for establishing extra access points to vault. Additional upgrade modules can be installed.

ThingDef.label: ultra storage vault sub panel
ThingDef.description: Sub terminal connected to existing terminal of ultra type for additional access point to it.
